# The `ValueMaterializer` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is a class that can be implemented by clients to materialize Values on demand. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::ValueMaterializer</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This is a class that can be implemented by clients to materialize Values on demand.

## Public Member Functions

### materialize() {#a6ce56d54f8ed7760164ee51801578634}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual Value &#42; llvm::ValueMaterializer::materialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}>
This method can be implemented to generate a mapped <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> on demand.

For example, if linking lazily. Returns null if the value is not materialized.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/valuemapper-h/#l00068">68</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/valuemapper-h">ValueMapper.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
